articles.title: Paytm's strong financial services now at 18% of total revenue | Mint - Mint
articles.description: The company’s revenue in the ‘Financial Services and Others’ business stood at  ₹349 crore in Q2FY23, up 293% YoY and 29% QoQ, supported by sourcing and collection revenues in the loan distribution business
articles.content: Reaffirming its dominance as Indias leading digital payments and financial services company, Paytm on Monday reported 76% year-on-year (YoY) growth in its overall revenue for Q2FY23. In its earnings … [+2833 chars]
